chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall m : state, mpl_compat_7_def m

Premises:
mpl_compat_7_def = fun s : state => forall (c : ad) (pl l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> MapGet prec_list (union_mpl_0 c pl s) c = Some (union_pl pl l) : state -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
mpl_compat_7_2 : forall m : Map prec_list, mpl_compat_7_def m -> forall m0 : Map prec_list, mpl_compat_7_def m0 -> mpl_compat_7_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
predta_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m0 -> predta_compatible_compat_def (M2 state m m0)
le_max_r : forall n m : nat, m <= Nat.max n m
Nat.sub_add : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> m - n + n = m
Nat.le_succ_l : forall n m : nat, S n <= m < -> n < m
st_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m0 -> st_compatible_compat_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
le_max_l : forall n m : nat, n <= Nat.max n m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Nat.ones_add : forall n m : nat, Nat.ones (m + n) = 2 ^ m * Nat.ones n + Nat.ones m
Nat.ones_div_pow2 : forall n m : nat, m <= n -> Nat.ones n / 2 ^ m = Nat.ones (n - m)
beq_nat_complete : forall n m : nat, (n =? m) = true -> n = m
Inductive le (n : nat) : nat -> Prop := le_n : n <= n | le_S : forall m : nat, n <= m -> n <= S m For le: Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope] For le_n: Argument scope is [nat_scope] For le_S: Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope _]
mpl_compat_7_1 : forall (a : ad) (a0 : prec_list), mpl_compat_7_def (M1 prec_list a a0)
MapMerge_semantics : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A), eqm A (MapGet A (MapMerge A m m')) (fun a0 : ad => match MapGet A m' a0 with | Some y' => Some y' | None => MapGet A m a0 end)
BinNatDef.N.lxor = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => m | N.pos p => match m with | 0%N => n | N.pos q => Pos.lxor p q end end : N -> N -> N Argument scopes are [N_scope N_scope]
Init.Nat.max = fix max (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S n' => match m with | 0 => n | S m' => S (max n' m') end end : nat -> nat -> nat Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
Init.Nat.eqb = fix eqb (n m : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => match m with | 0 => true | S _ => false end | S n' => match m with | 0 => false | S m' => eqb n' m' end end : nat -> nat -> bool Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
BinNatDef.N.eqb = fix eqb (n m : N) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0%N => match m with | 0%N => true | N.pos _ => false end | N.pos p => match m with | 0%N => false | N.pos q => (p =? q)%positive end end : N -> N -> bool Argument scopes are [N_scope N_scope]
state_in_dta_M0_false : forall s : state, ~ state_in_dta (M0 state) s
pl_compat_check = fix pl_compat_check (p : prec_list) : option nat := match p with | prec_cons _ la (prec_cons _ _ _ as ls) => match pl_compat_check la with | Some n => match pl_compat_check ls with | Some m => if S n =? m then Some m else None | None => None end | None => None end | prec_cons _ la prec_empty => match pl_compat_check la with | Some n => Some (S n) | None => None end | prec_empty => Some 0 end : prec_list -> option nat
st_compatible_compat : forall s0 s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1
mpl_compat_sym : forall s0 s1 : state, mpl_compat s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s1 s0
umpl_conv_1_inj : forall s0 s1 : state, umpl_conv_1 s0 = umpl_conv_1 s1 -> s0 = s1
umpl_conv_0_inj : forall s0 s1 : state, umpl_conv_0 s0 = umpl_conv_0 s1 -> s0 = s1
Nat.lxor_wd = fun (a a' : nat) (Ha : a = a') (b b' : nat) (Hb : b = b') => Nat.bits_inj (Nat.lxor a b) (Nat.lxor a' b') (fun m : nat => eq_ind_r (fun b0 : bool => b0 = Nat.testbit (Nat.lxor a' b') m) (eq_ind_r (fun b0 : bool => xorb (Nat.testbit a m) (Nat.testbit b m) = b0) ((fun lemma : a = a' => Morphisms.trans_co_eq_inv_impl_morphism RelationClasses.eq_Transitive (xorb (Nat.testbit a m) (Nat.testbit b m)) (xorb (Nat.testbit a' m) (Nat.testbit b m)) (Morphisms.reflexive_proper xorb (Nat.testbit a m) (Nat.testbit a' m) (Nat.testbit_wd a a' lemma m m (Morphisms.reflexive_proper_proxy...
borne_1_0 : forall s : state, state_in_dta (M0 state) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M0 state)
st_compat_check_0 = fix st_compat_check_0 (pa : pre_ad) (sigma : signature) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ a p => match pl_compat_check p with | Some n => match MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) with | Some m => n =? m | None => false end | None => false end | @M2 _ x y => st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_O pa) sigma x && st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_I pa) sigma y end : pre_ad -> signature -> state -> bool
st_compatible_compat_def = fun s0 : state => forall s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : state -> Prop
mpl_compat_2 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s1 s3

```coq
unfold mpl_compat_7_def. intros.
induction m; intros; eauto.
Qed.```
